message:
In Vegas next week
Desiring a sneak peek
At what’s going to be great,
ZTE’s BladeV8?
If the answer’s yes
We’ll be at CES,
So get in the groove
Come stop by our booth
Checkout the BladeV8
And don’t be late! https://www.ces.tech/

Technology is changing the classroom. Students now access personalized, learning tools online anywhere…next step: ZTE’s new All-in-One touchscreen which integrates an interactive electronic whiteboard, digital TV, stereo and computer system. http://bit.ly/2iHwpcw

ZTE has started undergoing a transformation and modernization process in the past year to allow it to be a complete  ICT solution provider for the demands of the future. Check out the article below to see how the company has developed a platform to better serve customers. http://bit.ly/2iiKFwf
Wherever you are in the world, we wish you and your loved ones a very Merry Christmas! #SeasonsGreetings

Big Video Solution from ZTE! Our end-to-end Big Video Solution delivers video content to end users with fast  speed, high quality and exceptional reliability. With 4K, the user can enjoy the ultimate in clear, smooth and colorful video experiences. http://bit.ly/2hcMHMs

In a Children’s Artwork Contest by #ZTE USA, employees’ kids drew an amazing future. Bold imagination is where disruptive innovation starts. We can’t wait to turn what comes from today’s great minds into tomorrow’s reality, because #TomorrowNeverWaits
http://bit.ly/2h9llqx

ZTE has completed microwave 1000-hop link provisioning for its Saudi Arabian partner STC, the largest telecoms operator in the Middle East and North Africa. ZTE is providing STC with an all-outdoor radio solution which provides high-capacity ethernet transmission for 3G/LTE and even Pre5G with no requirement for indoor space. 
  
The provisioning not only enables STC to deliver an improved service experience to enterprise customers, but also saves them money – no indoor rental, quicker installation and lower engineering costs. It will help STC to grow revenues in the Saudi Arabian government and enterprise microwave market.
http://bit.ly/2ieoyCT

ZTE joins forces with Telefónica! Together we will build a network to deliver Voice over LTE (VoLTE) and VoWiFi services to Telefónica customers across 7 countries in Latin America. That means more secure, more reliable connections for millions! #Tomorrowneverwaits

Four times faster than 4G's maximum download speed, ZTE and Telenet completed an outfield Pre5G test, making Telenet the first operator in Europe to have achieved 1.3Gbps download speed in real network condition.
A smartphone designed by ZTE fans will soon be a reality. Congrats to Team One Technology, winner of the ZTE Crowd Sourcing X project. Get a sneak peek at #CES2017!
Fast, high quality streaming takes a lot of behind the scenes work. Learn more about how ZTE engineers help advance streaming for everyone with 5G products.
With the help of ZTE, Telefónica will soon launch Pre5G, VR and 2K streaming videos in Spain. What makes you excited about a faster web?
‘#5G networks can theoretically transmit data 20 times faster than current 4G networks’ – ZTE CIO & CSO Chen Jie
PTCL allows the world to know more about Pakistan’s culture. See how the award-winning SmartTV Platform co-developed by ZTE does this.
The future of your city might just look like #Yinchuan, where even dustbins are integrated into a powerful system that is beneficial to its citizens.
The journey to #5G is accelerating. Today, our leading position has been recognized by Telecom Asia.
1.3 million people in Luohu China are now getting more efficient family doctor services #IoT #cloudcomputing
How reliable is your mobile internet? ZTE & MediaTek have just tested a solution to help operators eliminate network blind spots
Happy #Thanksgiving everyone. Earlier this month, we are honored to join #ChicagoBulls to give back to the community. Together, we hosted a Thanksgiving meal for Chicago residents in need. #TurkeyDay
Stay connected on the go! Our solution deployed at Shanghai-Hangzhou high-speed rail helps optimize the #4G network and makes #commuterlife better

Many of us take for granted the access we have to clean quality safe water. Smart Water solutions are helping better provide information on quality in real time – giving timely forewarnings. Find out more about our work showcased at #WIC #WuzhenSummit #SmartCities
#EV are now common place - Our #SmartCity solutions allow drivers to charge their cars at street lamps. Enjoy your hassle-free journey. http://bit.ly/2fkn5cp
Often find yourself without Wi-Fi? Our #SmartCity solutions can turn street lamps into Wi-Fi hotspots #SCEWC16 bit.ly/2gle74l
Set-top-boxes have transformed TV and gaming. ZTE’s Android TV set-top-box is the ultimate in video streaming and gaming. When did you #cutthecord? http://bit.ly/2gmnhNo
We're giving away all-expenses paid trips to see the world's largest technology trade show in Las Vegas #CES2017 U.S. residents only, Ts&Cs apply

For 14 years, the Chicago Bulls have hosted an Thanksgiving meal for homeless Chicago residents. As the Bull’s official smartphone sponsor, ZTE has been honored to participate since 2015. http://bit.ly/2eSBPiD
We're excited to join our peers at #AfricaCom 2016 to discuss how #AR, #VR and #5G will shape our digital future around the world and across Africa.
PwC has released their 2016 Global Innovation 1000 Study. We’re excited to share that ZTE is now the second-largest R&D spender in China. #tomorrowneverwaits http://pwc.to/2fKIbGu

We’re recruiting talent from overseas, top-notch universities! A lot of great students attended ZTE’s University Student Recruitment Program at UCLA and we received more than 4,000 applications. Next stop: UCB & MIT http://bit.ly/2fgLf82
Life is smarter when you can control the all the electronics in your home with the touch of a button. At BBWF, ZTE demonstrated innovation in smart home with Home Cloud, our award-winning solution.
ZTE announces 2016 Q1-Q3 results - an increase in net profit of 9.78% to RMB2.8 billion. Key drivers are local and overseas 4G system and optical transmission products. http://bit.ly/2dLttO3
Got developer skills? Watch out for next year’s TADhack Global Developer Contest, which provides developers a chance to realize their innovations using ZTE’s IoT platform. http://bit.ly/2fePWTN

ZTE’s Global Services User Congress has come to a close in Germany. Network operators, industry analysts and ZTE leaders gathered to explore the opportunities presented by technologies such as AR/VR. http://bit.ly/2eRb7bD

We follow great talent anywhere! ZTE offers Chinese students studying in the US a job at home after graduation. Interested? Check out the Universities Students Recruitment Program. 

http://bit.ly/2eMQP1A

Zhao Xianming, President of ZTE, shares his thoughts on the future of the 4K and 8K TV viewing experience, and AR/VR. Content in these sectors is exploding and ushering in the era of Big Video.

http://www.scmp.com/tech/china-tech/article/2039354/are-you-ready-era-big-video

The era of 8K video everywhere is approaching fast. Some predict that in 2020, annual sales of 8K televisions will exceed 2.1 million. To make these TVs as awesome as we hope they’ll be, we need platforms like ZTE’s TITAN to provide superfast access bandwidth.
http://www.zte.com.cn/global/about/press-center/news/201610ma/1020ma1
We’re excited to announce that the AXON 7 and AXON 7 mini are now available for our fans in Japan and Russia!
We’ve rolled out a new solution, ZTE Big Video 4K+, just for Europe. Get ready to enjoy a vivid, smooth ultra-HD video experience with services like 4K, 8K, VR and AR.

Are you ready? Your chance to experience the best of the Broadband World Forum 2016 is coming up in just 30 minutes! #ZTE is live streaming from our booth at #BBWF2016, and you’ll have a chance to have all of your questions about the latest broadband tech answered in real time! Make sure to tune it – this is one event you won’t want to miss! To watch, click https://www.facebook.com/ZTECorp/app/208195102528120/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IBeYEqyUGQE&feature=youtu.be

Wanna get firsthand insight about the ZTE tech that will change the world? Check out our live stream of BBWF from 15:30-16:30 GMT on October 19th 

Click here to watch the live stream: https://eloqua.smarket.net.cn/ZTE_BBWF/index.php

Less than 24 hours till the start of the Broadband World Forum 2016! Can't make it to London before tomorrow? No worries! We've got you covered! On Oct. 19 from British Summer Time 15:30-16:30

(Beijing Time 22:30-23:30 on Oct.19), we'll be live streaming from our booth at BBWF 2016, so no matter where you are, you can get in on the action! Plus, you can have all of your questions about ZTE's latest broadband tech answered in real time!

5G and 4K resolution are way closer to us than you might have thought. At the Broadband World Forum 2016 in London, ZTE and industry peers will discuss how to accelerate people’s journey to smarter lives.
4K TV is possible – we’re launching our 4K Capable Android TV Set-Top-Box at BBWF 2016. It integrates with a smart 4K TV ecosystem. Are you ready for exceptional 4K TV with minimal lag?
“The Future Is On”! ZTE is debuting our Big Broadband solution at BBWF in London on Oct 19. We hope our work will bring people closer and help them live smarter with ultra-high-speed connections.
Cheng Lixin, SVP of ZTE Corp, returned to his alma mater, Zhejiang University, to encourage the high-flying students there and everywhere to pursue their careers and dreams.

Big Video Summit 2016 is around the corner - ZTE and our peers will discuss getting prepped for 4K, 8K, AR and VR in the #BigVideoEra

http://bit.ly/2e2QdV8

Can you imagine life with no lights? 1.5 billion people live with no access to electricity. But there’s progress - ZTE’s Simba Solar Home System brings green power to homes in sub-Saharan Africa. 
http://bit.ly/2dxhZwa
Tech innovation is possible when young people have the resources they need. We excited to say we’ve signed on to 19 projects with Ethiopia to rebuild schools sustainably – to the next generation!
